response.original_title: El duelo de una espina dorsal
response.overview: Ultimately exploring the impossibility of capturing the totality of a story in an image, an object, or anything at all, this essay film allows narratives to pause and expand, inviting a deeper exploration of their cuts, structures, and visual representations. Here, movements transform into tangible objects, images bend and sever, and ideas are articulated in a flowing stream of consciousness that unfolds with its own momentum.
response.title: The Backbone Of Loss

titles.title: La espina dorsal de un duelo
